content: this lovely forked half_double_crochet washcloth is my may contribution to the 2024 washcloth cal it works up super quickly and has a fantastic texture > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above materials approximately 46-177 yds of category 4 medium weight cotton yarn i used knit picks dishie yarn in the begonia colorway size i 5 5mm furls streamline gemini zodiac pollux crochet hook yarn needle for weaving ends scissors
